channel.title: Best free webhost?
channel.description:
Hey, I was wondering what is the best, most reliable, and free webhost that I can host my forums on.
Thanks. :)

item.title: Best free webhost?
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:7, topic:342935"][quote author=xEvo link=topic=439337.msg3229052#msg3229052 date=1275856902]

If you just want to a host a forum on your website ulmb is probably your best shot. You get like 5gb space, 500gb bandwidth and most importantly mysql. It’s one of the most reliable hosts that I have used and they don’t cut you off randomly (less than X hits in X days) like other free webhosts do!
The negatives are that other than the above, the control panel sucks and you don’t get any useful features like cron jobs but you wont need thoses for a forum so go for it!

I used them once, but someone on my site said that their ads gave him a virus.
[/quote]

Don’t believe someone unless you have tried it. Ulmb is a good webhost.[/quote]
Alright, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Best free webhost?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“xEvo, post:6, topic:342935”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=439337.msg3228515#msg3228515 date=1275816601]
If you just want to a host a forum on your website ulmb is probably your best shot. You get like 5gb space, 500gb bandwidth and most importantly mysql. It’s one of the most reliable hosts that I have used and they don’t cut you off randomly (less than X hits in X days) like other free webhosts do!
The negatives are that other than the above, the control panel sucks and you don’t get any useful features like cron jobs but you wont need thoses for a forum so go for it!
[/quote]
I used them once, but someone on my site said that their ads gave him a virus. :/[/quote]

Don’t believe someone unless you have tried it. Ulmb is a good webhost.

Read full topic
